text:
A teacher on the Women’s Studies course at Oxford worries that scientists at the university might be the first to develop a vaccine.

Apparently, this would stir up nationalist sentiment. Or help the Tories. Or something.

They’ll never stop this nonsense.
https://t.co/AaFMpKzMBf
